code: Plot(Array.random(1000),{type:'histogram',min:0,max:1,delta:0.02,size:12,width:800});

var y = Array.vector(50,Math.sin)
Plot(y,{labels:{x:'time',y:'strain'},width:600,box:true})

var y = Array.init(50,Math.sin).merge(Array.init(50,Math.cos),'c');
Plot(y,{type:'line',labels:{x:'time',y:'strain'},min:0, max:2,width:600})

Plot(data,{type:'image',zoom:2,colorIndex:2 /*'black/red/blue/green'*/,invert:true})

Plot(data,{type:'image',zoom:2,colorIndex:9,crosshair:true})

Plot(data,{width:600})
